channel.title: Dual Login
channel.description: Ok what about dual login? How prevent to be cought using 2 accs at the same time. Tell everything about dual login.Coz i dont want to get my main banned while using another acc. Friend told if 2nd acc dont talk and have private chat off he cant get banned for dat. Thx for info :* Mopar for the win

item.title: Dual Login
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

To do a dual login on their site just on the detail select page where you choose teh java type you want to use do one on unsigned and another defaulted go the same world and thats all… no big secret… nor is it hard

Read full topic

item.title: Dual Login
item.dc:creator: @twink_sniffer twink sniffer
item.description:
@twink_sniffer wrote:

What if you have 2 computers with the same ip and ur trading like that? Can you get banned ?

Read full topic

item.title: Dual Login
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

Doesn’t matter if they’re on the same computer or anything like that. Dual login is only bannable if you are on the same computer, world, and give your other account stuff (yeah, that’s the point where the rules were broken)!!

Read full topic

item.title: Dual Login
item.dc:creator: @tom55 tom55
item.description:
@tom55 wrote:

Well just use a client that allows that. Its simple.
